## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G02050](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G02050)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LAP6, PKSA</u>
- **Gene Name:** LESS ADHESIVE POLLEN 6, polyketide synthase A
- **Description:**   Chalcone and stilbene synthase family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2205588
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS68659]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Abnormal exine patterning. Pollen has a more extensively covered surface with broader muri and smaller lacunae. Reduced accumulation of flavonoid precursors and flavonoids in developing anthers.
